comment: Hows this for multiculturalism? A set of Confederate flag jewelry (earrings & necklace) intended for the Arab market, made in communist China but priced in British pounds sterling, featuring Spongebob Squarepants on the packaging, for sale in a Pakistani convenience store. If that isnt an example of the wonders of global commerce, I dont know what is.
